title: Russia-Ukraine War News LIVE Updates: ‘Most terrible crimes’ since World War II being committed in Ukraine, Zelenskyy tells UNSC - The Indian Express
content:
1. Russia-Ukraine War News LIVE Updates: ‘Most terrible crimes’ since World War II being committed in Ukraine, Zelenskyy tells UNSC  The Indian Express
  2. WATCH: Zelensky addresses UN Security Council  Washington Post
  3. Zelensky to address UN Security Council amid global outrage over mass killings  Hindustan Times
  4. Ukraine War Updates: At UN, Ukraine President Demands Accountability For Russia "Crimes"  NDTV
  5. Russia Ukraine War News Live Updates: “Are you ready to close the U.N.?” asks Ukraine President Zelenskyy...  Economic Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Russia-Ukraine War Live News, Ukraine Russia News Today, 5 Apr: Moscow has faced global revulsion and accusations of war crimes after the Russian pullout from the outskirts of Kyiv revealed streets strewn with corpses of what appeared to be civilians, some of whom had seemingly been killed at close range.
